properties.sql:
WITH CONTRATACAO_BCP AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BCP%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BCP"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_NB AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_NVB%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "NVB"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_CTT AS(SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_CTT%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BCTT"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_MG AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_MTG%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "MTG"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_BNI AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BNI%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BNI"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_BST AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BST%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BST"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_BIC AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BIC%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BIC"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_GEN AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_GEN%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "GEN"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
CONTRATACAO_ABN AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_ABN%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "ABN"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
FILTRO AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_FLT%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "FLT"
                    GROUP BY p.id),
PRODUCAO AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_PRD%') AND (dp.c_fase_processo = "PRD" OR dp.c_fase_processo = "VAL")
                    GROUP BY p.id),
VALIDACAO AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_VAL%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "VAL"
                    GROUP BY p.id)

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BCP
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_NB
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_MG
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_CTT
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BNI
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BST
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BIC
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_GEN
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_ABN
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM FILTRO
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PRODUCAO
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM VALIDACAO
